title: PointerEvent: altitude angle property
summary:
The altitude angle read-only property of the PointerEvent interface represents the angle between a transducer (a pointer or stylus) axis and the X-Y plane of a device screen.
  The altitude angle describes whether the transducer is perpendicular to the screen, parallel, or at some angle in between.
pageTitle: PointerEvent: altitude angle property - Web APIs | MDN
